content: {"name": "Bridgeton City Parks & Recreation Summer STEAM Program", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Start date\t7/13/2025\nEnd date\t8/6/2025", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1 Burt Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Bridgeton", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08302", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.4354465, "longitude": -75.2465883}, "phones": [{"number": "(856) 455-8030", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "13:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "13:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "13:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "13:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "04:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "04:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "04:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "04:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Meals must be eaten on site."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "All children under 18 are eligible"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Summer Meal Program"}]}
